title: Should We Defund The Police?
description: "Defund the police" has become one of the central demands coming from the protests that have arisen following George Floyd's killing at the hands of a white police office. On this episode, Kate and Luigi take an economist's look at the concept of defunding the police.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
